title: Peek-a-boo! How to pull off the underwear as outerwear trend this fall like supermodel Gigi Hadid
text:
Gigi Hadid is the latest celeb to get on board with the underwear as outerwear trend.

Over the weekend, the supermodel was spotted in New York City putting her own spin on the provocative look.

The 24-year-old wore a sheer turtleneck that showed off her modest matching-hued bra underneath.

Peek-a-boo: Gigi Hadid is the latest celeb to get on board with the underwear as outerwear trend

Sleek and chic: Over the weekend, the supermodel was spotted in New York City putting her own spin on the provocative look. The 24-year-old wore a sheer turtleneck that showed off her modest matching-hued bra underneath

Gigi nailed the look for a Saturday afternoon stroll by keeping it classy and season appropriate in an autumnal color.

She paired the thin sweater with high-waisted trousers and accessorized with python-effect boots by Kalda, several gold chains, and black squared sunglasses.

The cover model put her pretty face on full display with a sleek ponytail hairdo, featuring a center part.

To pull off the exposed bra trend in a sophisticated way, à la Gigi, layer a lightweight knit top or sheer blouse over a full-coverage underpinning in a classic shape and coordinating shade. Leave lacy risque styles for the bedroom!
